page.title: 06Employment in N.St Ives
page.content: The area of North St.Ives consists of fields,two housing estates,a Royal Air Force station and a few shops. There are a few jobs on farms and in shops but there are many different jobs at Royal Air Force Wyton.However most people travel outside the area to work.Some people work at the Rainbow Supermarket.Others travel to Cambridge. In St.Ives it is mostly men who have jobs.These men chose their jobs themselves.Some ladies work in shops. Two people out of three thought they received fair pay.One person was self-employed.Nobody worked a night-shift. Only one person has been unemployed, but for only two weeks. All the men liked their jobs.Many mothers and fathers have professional jobs,like teachers and managers.
